mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Buckingham, Catharinus P.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His Excy F.H. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 18 1862. By Telegraph from Washington 18 1862. 12.10 am Required to fill up your regiments in the field August thirteenth 13 eighteen hundred and sixty two 1862. five thousand five hundred eight three 5583 men. C.P. Buckingham Brig Genl & A.A.G. 23.B.102pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Buckingham, Catharinus P.
Washington, D.C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
